      • incrementTestScopeCounter

      • executeWithoutFaultInjection

        public static void executeWithoutFaultInjection​(BlockType blockType,
                                                java.lang.Runnable block)
        Execute the following block without faults.

        Assumes that the block is executed synchronously -- use of this inside of concurrency primitives without explicit synchronization may render this function unable to prevent faults from being injected.

        Parameters:
        blockType - BlockType used only for display
        block - block to execute synchronously.
